name: germy
content:

containing germs (= small organisms that cause disease): Hundreds of kids dunked their germy little hands into the water. The place was so germy and gross that I won't be going back.
More examplesFewer examplesThe "Wash your hands" posters featured a germy green hand.A germy build-up can weaken your body's natural defences.Children should wash their hands before and after eating, after messy activities, and after contact with potentially germy objects such as animals.She said that drinking fountains were germy.He says that one of the germiest things in public spaces is the ground-floor button in a lift.
